title: Um I can't seem to logout....
body:
Like right here on this forum " https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/ " I can't seem to logout. I click logout and get the: 
"You have been signed out. You may safely close this window."
Then I go back to " https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/ " and I'm simply still logged in...

replies.body: Clearing my 'boards.na.leagueoflegends.com' cookies did it. Thank you! Many marshmallows for DatFatRaccoon

Think some issues with your hyper links might have happened; both of them seem to be for the Boards home page, but I'm only getting 404 errors when I click em. But your problem is you're not able to logout at all. Are you logged in on any other platform maybe, like the Friends App, the game or our Support site?

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4I3BflEB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-15T01:45:47.733+0000)
>
> Think some issues with your hyper links might have happened; both of them seem to be for the Boards home page, but I'm only getting 404 errors when I click em. But your problem is you're not able to logout at all. Are you logged in on any other platform maybe, like the Friends App, the game or our Support site?

I was permanently banned from my account about a week or 2 ago so this might have something to do with this issue.
At the time of posting this I was not logged into any other League platform. 
Since the time of writing this I have logged on to the support site for an unrelated ticket about my ban. 
I seem to be able to Log in and out of the support site just fine regardless of this forum. 
The issue is still present.

I think the best option here would be to try [**clearing your browsing history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies). After that try one more log out if you aren't already afterward.

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4I3BflEB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-15T01:45:47.733+0000)
>
> Think some issues with your hyper links might have happened; both of them seem to be for the Boards home page, but I'm only getting 404 errors when I click em. But your problem is you're not able to logout at all. Are you logged in on any other platform maybe, like the Friends App, the game or our Support site?

The reason you were getting a 404 error is because the quote mark at the end of the link was for some reason included in the hyperlink. I added a space in between them and that fixed the link. Separate from my original issue of course.
